summary: This is a craftable armor set for both male and female characters under the Iron catagory. There are three pieces, armor, boots, and gloves. The female version is weighted for BBP (sevenbase!).
descriptionHtml:
Edhildils Orc Lord War Harness
Author: Edhildil
10,23,2013
ver1



[img]http://img832.imageshack.us/img832/1236/descriptionn.png[/img]

First of all, I made this armor the way I wanted to, to my specifications, That is why it has my name in the title. 
It is MY mod. please respect that.

If it is to skimpy or not lore friendly, or not good enough for you, simply skip this mod. 

If you are going to leave a comment please be intelligent about it. 

If you are having trouble with this mod please leave enough details so I can understand what is going on. 



This is a craftable armor set for both male and female characters under the Iron catagory. There are three pieces, Armor, 

boots, and gloves. The female version is weighted for BBP (sevenbase). I mainly focused on the male armor but decided to make 

a female version. Right now sevenbase is the only body type I have made due to time. I may do other female bodies later. 

If any modders out there want to convert to CBBE, UNP, UNPB, ADEC, or any other body type, go for it. If you do make a 

replacer for the female armor please send me a link so I can post it here. Also make it dependant on this mod.


[img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/4153/requir.png[/img]


Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488

SeveNBase a custom FemaleBodyReplacer by Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/36992

CHSBHC - BBP - Nude and Jiggly Mod by CherryHotaling ( BBP animations and skeletons)
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4888

I had the best results by manually installing these animations and skeletons, NMM freaks out alot.

 
[img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/2482/installa.png[/img]


Unzip Data file to a temporary location. 

copy/paste into Skyrim folder.


[img]http://img443.imageshack.us/img443/9233/uninstall.png[/img]

Delete the EdhildilsOrcLordWarHarness.esp file. 
Delete meshes/armor/edhildil/orclord folder 
Delete textures/armor/edhildil/orclord folder



[img]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8579/creditslo.png[/img]

Chris57 and FavoredSoul (Better Males)
Crosscrusade DeMoNhUnTeR1986 Sevennity (sevenbase) 
CherryHotaling (BBP)
Edhildil (these new meshes and textures)
Bethesda (original meshes)

Tools used:
=======
Blender
Nifscope
GIMP 2

Tes5edit

Thanks to all above and to Skyrim Nexus.
Special thanks to my teachers, Apachii, A_TyPE 2 aka Speedbuster, Growlf, Robert, Coronerra, and others.
A shout out to 2pac4eva7, Acdale, Midas, and to my friends on nexus, my fans, and everyone who loves modding. Cheers! 

[img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/4562/usaget.png[/img]

If you want to use my meshes in your mod please give the proper credits listed in your mod readme/description. It would also 

be nice if you sent me a link so I can check out your mod. Enjoy!
author: Edhildil
